  • Method Details

    • uiReady

      public static PolicyLocationSummaryBuilder uiReady(CurrencyAmount totalInsured)
      Returns a builder to construct a UI ready PolicyLocationSummary. The following fields are set:
      • Addressline1 City PostalCode State Country InsuredAddressLine1 InsuredCity InsuredPostalCode InsuredState InsuredCountry Latitude Longitude PolicyNumber TotalInsured
      Parameters:
      totalInsured -
      Returns:
      a new PolicyLocationSummary builder
